metadata.title: CVE-2024-48938 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Znuny before LTS 6.5.1 through 6.5.10 and 7.0.1 through 7.0.16 allowsDoS/ReDos via email. Parsing the content of emails where HTML code iscopied from Microsoft Word could lead to high CPU usage and block theparsing process.

criterions.comment: znuny package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
